# SNIPER Documentation
> AI-Powered Project Lifecycle Framework for Claude Code

## Guide
- [What is SNIPER?](/guide/what-is-sniper)
- [Getting Started](/guide/getting-started)
- [Core Concepts](/guide/core-concepts)
- [Configuration](/guide/configuration)
- [Full Lifecycle](/guide/full-lifecycle)
- [Review Gates](/guide/review-gates)
- [Personas](/guide/personas)
- [Teams](/guide/teams)
- [Domain Packs](/guide/domain-packs)
- [Workspace Mode](/guide/workspace-mode)
- [Memory System](/guide/memory)
- [Troubleshooting](/guide/troubleshooting)
- [Glossary](/guide/glossary)
- [Commands Cheatsheet](/guide/cheatsheet-commands)
- [Teams Cheatsheet](/guide/cheatsheet-teams)
- [Personas Cheatsheet](/guide/cheatsheet-personas)

## Commands
- [/sniper-audit](/reference/commands/sniper-audit): Audit: Refactoring, Review & QA
- [/sniper-compose](/reference/commands/sniper-compose): Compose a Spawn Prompt from Persona Layers
- [/sniper-debug](/reference/commands/sniper-debug): Production Debugging (Phased Investigation)
- [/sniper-discover](/reference/commands/sniper-discover): Phase 1: Discovery & Analysis (Parallel Team)
- [/sniper-doc](/reference/commands/sniper-doc): Generate or Update Project Documentation (Parallel Team)
- [/sniper-feature](/reference/commands/sniper-feature): Incremental Feature Lifecycle
- [/sniper-ingest](/reference/commands/sniper-ingest): Codebase Ingestion (Parallel Team)
- [/sniper-init](/reference/commands/sniper-init): Initialize SNIPER in a New or Existing Project
- [/sniper-memory](/reference/commands/sniper-memory): Manage Agent Memory (Conventions, Anti-Patterns, Decisions)
- [/sniper-plan](/reference/commands/sniper-plan): Phase 2: Planning & Architecture (Parallel Team with Coordination)
- [/sniper-review](/reference/commands/sniper-review): Run Review Gate for the Current Phase
- [/sniper-solve](/reference/commands/sniper-solve): Phase 3: Epic Sharding & Story Creation (Single Agent)
- [/sniper-sprint](/reference/commands/sniper-sprint): Phase 4: Implementation Sprint (Parallel Team)
- [/sniper-status](/reference/commands/sniper-status): Show Lifecycle Status and Artifact State
- [/sniper-workspace-feature](/reference/commands/sniper-workspace-feature)
- [/sniper-workspace-init](/reference/commands/sniper-workspace-init)
- [/sniper-workspace-status](/reference/commands/sniper-workspace-status)
- [/sniper-workspace-validate](/reference/commands/sniper-workspace-validate)
